Description: Sycomore fig wood shabti covered with a layer of painted plaster with a blue lappet wig with a yellow fillet, a brown face, a blue collar, crossed brown hands in relief, the legs inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of the Dead in five rows of black painted hieroglyphs separated by red lines, the back is decorated with a representation of a red seed-basket which reaches the feet, the whole figure is thickly varnished.
